task.title: Opening the bonnet
task.shortdesc: Open the bonnet when you need to access the engine. It has two separate mechanisms to ensure it is securely fastened, so it is important you are familiar with how to open it.

context.note: When the bonnet is open, ensure the release lever and safey catch are well lubricated.

step.cmd: Insert a finger in the centre top louvre of the radiator shell.
Move the release lever toward the right-hand side of the vehicle.
step.info: Push down on the bonnet with your other hand to assist movement of the lever.
step.stepresult: The bonnet is released but is still held by the safety catch.

step.cmd: Push the safety catch inwards and raise the bonnet.
Hold the bonnet in the open position with your hand while you get the prop ready with your other hand.
Detach the prop from the rubber clip on the right-hand side.
Secure the prop in the support bracket on the right-hand valance.
